report.title: List of terms
report.query: with recursive nodes(id, path) as ( select id, term, 1 as level from cache_termlists_terms where parent_id is null and termlist_id=#termlist_id# and preferred=true and website_id in (#website_ids#) union all select o.id, concat(path, '->', term), level + 1 from cache_termlists_terms o join nodes n on n.id = o.parent_id where o.preferred=true and (#max_depth#=0 or level<#max_depth#) ) select id, path as term from nodes where (#min_depth#=0 or level>=#min_depth#) order by path;
